Anal()

Command to fetch and display NSFW content from the "anal" subreddit.

Declaration
[Cmd("Anal")]
[Aliases("Anal")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[RequireNsfw]
public Task Anal()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.

AutoBoobs(int)

Command to start or stop automatic posting of NSFW content from the "boobs" subreddit at specified intervals in the current guild channel.

Declaration
[Cmd("AutoBoobs")]
[Aliases("AutoBoobs")]
[RequireNsfw]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(ChannelPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task AutoBoobs(int interval = 0)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int interval

The interval in seconds between each automatic posting. Set to 0 to stop automatic posting.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.
| Edit this page View Source

AutoHentai(int, string?)

Command to start or stop automatic posting of NSFW content at specified intervals in the current guild channel.

Declaration
[Cmd("AutoHentai")]
[Aliases("AutoHentai")]
[RequireNsfw]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(ChannelPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task AutoHentai(int interval = 0, string? tags = null)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int interval

The interval in seconds between each automatic posting. Set to 0 to stop automatic posting.
string tags

Optional tags to filter the NSFW content. Separate multiple tags with '|'. Leave blank for random NSFW content.
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task representing the asynchronous operation.

Remarks

RedditNsfw(string)

Command to retrieve NSFW content from a specified subreddit.

Declaration
[Cmd("RedditNsfw")]
[Aliases("RedditNsfw")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[RequireNsfw]
[Ratelimit(10)]
public Task RedditNsfw(string subreddit)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string subreddit

The name of the subreddit from which to fetch the content.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command requires the context to be in a guild. NSFW (Not Safe For Work) content is required for this command. The command is rate-limited to 10 uses within a specified time frame.

| Edit this page View Source
